com.navis.framework.persistence.hibernate

Interface ITransactionParmsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTransactionParmsManager

    public interface ITransactionParmsManager
    Manages handling of transaction parms. Currently, this interface mainly mirrors static methods in class TransactionParms for better testability.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind(TransactionParms inTransactionParms)
      Binds the transaction parms to the current thread.
      TransactionParms createTransactionParms()
      Creates a new instance of TransactionParms.
      TransactionParms getBoundParms()
      Retrieves the TransactionParms instance bound to the current thread.
      UserContext getBoundUserContext()
      Retrieves the currently bound user context.
      java.lang.String getBoundUserId()
      Convenience function for getting the userid off the thread
      boolean isBound()
      Answers the question, if there are currently transaction parms bound.
      void setUpTransactionsParms(UserContext inUserContext, MessageCollector inMessageCollector)
      Sets up transaction parms.
      void tearDownTransactionParms()
      Tears down current transaction parms.
      void unbind()
      Removes the bound instance of TransactionParms from the current thread
      void unbindIfBound()
      Unbind currently bound transaction parms, if there are any.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpTransactionsParms

        void setUpTransactionsParms(@NotNull
                            UserContext inUserContext,
                            @NotNull
                            MessageCollector inMessageCollector)
        Sets up transaction parms.
        Parameters:
        inUserContext - the user context to bind
        inMessageCollector - the message collector to bind

      • tearDownTransactionParms

        void tearDownTransactionParms()
        Tears down current transaction parms.

      • createTransactionParms

        @NotNull
TransactionParms createTransactionParms()
        Creates a new instance of TransactionParms.
        Returns:
        the new TransactionParms

      • bind

        void bind(@NotNull
          TransactionParms inTransactionParms)
        Binds the transaction parms to the current thread.
        Parameters:
        inTransactionParms - the transaction parms to be bound

      • unbind

        void unbind()
        Removes the bound instance of TransactionParms from the current thread

      • unbindIfBound

        void unbindIfBound()
        Unbind currently bound transaction parms, if there are any.

      • isBound

        boolean isBound()
        Answers the question, if there are currently transaction parms bound.
        Returns:
        true if TransactionParms already bound to threadlocal, false otherwise

      • getBoundParms

        TransactionParms getBoundParms()
        Retrieves the TransactionParms instance bound to the current thread.
        Returns:
        the bound transaction parms

      • getBoundUserId

        java.lang.String getBoundUserId()
        Convenience function for getting the userid off the thread
        Returns:
        the user associated with the bound transaction parms otherwise "-unknown-"

      • getBoundUserContext

        @Nullable
UserContext getBoundUserContext()
        Retrieves the currently bound user context.
        Returns:
        the user context
